ace-playbook-system.description: ACE playbook structure with specs/playbooks directory containing plan.md files with YAML frontmatter
patterns: YAML frontmatter with pattern_id, type, and updated timestamp
Technical plan markdown structure with Summary, Technical Context, Implementation Approach, Success Criteria sections

markdown-documentation.description: Structured markdown documentation with YAML frontmatter for metadata

pattern-metadata-schema.description: Pattern metadata structure with pattern_id, type, language, domain, confidence fields
patterns: Pattern ID with prefix and numeric suffix

template-driven-documentation.description: Standardized documentation templates with consistent sections across files

metadata-first-design.description: Structured metadata in frontmatter drives document classification and processing

iterative-refinement.description: Pattern-based system with confidence scoring and feedback loops for continuous improvement

machine-readable-human-friendly.description: Combine structured metadata (YAML) with human-readable content (Markdown) for dual purposes

auto-generated-documentation.description: Generate documentation automatically with clear attribution and timestamps

evidence-based-confidence.description: Track confidence metrics and monitor effectiveness through feedback mechanisms

modular-content-organization.description: Separate concerns into distinct files (plan.md, insights.md) with cross-references

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and YAML frontmatter structure
